page.title: 07Sports
page.content: {Cricket There is a cricket club in Weddington at Carters Field. I play in the Under-13 Team. When we play cricket, we have to wear gloves, pads and body protection. {Football Nuneaton Borough play in the Gala League at the Manor Park Ground. It costs 80p to stand but it is 30p more if you want to sit down. The large wooden stand is being replaced by a metal one. This is because there was a fire disaster at Bradford this year when many people were killed. {Rugby There are 15 players in a rugby team. Nuneaton has a club with a mini section. Boys from 7 to 17 play each Sunday. The colours of the shirts are black, red and white.
